data.title: East Tennessee Veterans Memorial Association â€” Lloyd, Harold E.
data.text:
He died in France and is buried in Todd Cemetery, Robbin, Scott County, TN

358th Infantry Regiment, 90th Infantry Division, Company A

Son of John Henry Lloyd and Cynthia B. Phillips.

Husband of Ethel Sexton and father of Charles E. and Edna Faye Lloyd.

Rank: Private

Date of birth:

25 January 1913

Date of death: 16 September 1944

County: Scott

Service Branch: Army/Army Air Forces

Division/Assignment: 358th Infantry Regiment, 90th Infantry Division

Theater: Europe

Conflict: World War II

Awards: Purple Heart

Burial/Memorial Location: Todd Cemetery, Robbin, Scott County, TN

Location In Memorial: Pillar XVII, Middle Panel

Contact us to sponsor Harold E. Lloyd
